General information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.
General information.Note: This version of the machine-readable comparison report is not definitive. The format is under discussion within the CCRI and CIPM to best reflect the requirements of ionizing radiation metrology and to conform to the SI digital framework. Users can use this document to analyse key comparison data and metadata more efficiently with their software. However, users should bear in mind that the format will necessarily evolve in subsequent updates of this key comparison, which will not guarantee the long-term compatibility of their interface.

References.[1]: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4
References.[2]: Romain Coulon et al 2023 Meas. Sci. Technol. 34 074009 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/accd0b

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57(2003.Reference of the published comparison re: G Ratel and C Michotte, BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{57}$Co, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/40/1A/06004}{\textit{Metrologia} 2003 \textbf{40} 06004}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57(2005.Reference of the published comparison re: G Ratel \textit{et al}, Activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{57}$Co for the NMIJ, Japan and the PTB, Germany in the ongoing comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/42/1A/06016}{\textit{Metrologia} 2005 \textbf{42} 06016}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57(2009.Reference of the published comparison re: C Michotte \textit{et al}, Activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{57}$Co for the NMIJ, Japan and the LNE-LNHB, France in the ongoing comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/46/1A/06005}{\textit{Metrologia} 2009 \textbf{46} 06005}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57(2012.Reference of the published comparison re: C Michotte \textit{et al}, Activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{57}$Co for the NIST, USA and the IFIN-HH, Romania in the ongoing comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/49/1A/06005}{\textit{Metrologia} 2012 \textbf{49} 06005}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57(2022.Reference of the published comparison re: C Michotte \textit{et al}, Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Co-57 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{57}$Co to include the 2013 result of the POLATOM (Poland), the 2015 result of the NMISA (South Africa), the 2021 result of the CMI (Czech Republic), and to link the CCRI(II)-S6.Co-57 comparison, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/59/1A/06015}{\textit{Metrologia} 2022 \textbf{59} 06015}

Linked comparison CCRI(II)-S6.Co-57(2008.Reference of the linked comparison: Zimmerman B.E. textit{et al.}, Results of an international comparison for the activity measurement of $^{57}$Co, \href{https://doi.org/10.1016/j.apradiso.2009.12.021}{\textit{Applied Radiation and Isotopes}, 2012, \textbf{70}:9, 1825}
